original_text: Now when the Lord was about to take Elijah up to heaven by a whirlwind, Elijah and Elisha were on their way from Gilgal.
korean_text: 여호와께서 회오리 바람으로 엘리야를 하늘로 올리고자 하실 때에 엘리야가 엘리사와 더불어 길갈에서 나가더니

sentences.original_text: Now when the Lord was about to take Elijah up to heaven by a whirlwind,
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 회오리바람으로 엘리야를 하늘로 데려가시려 할 때에,

sentences.original_text: Elijah and Elisha were on their way from Gilgal.
